column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been here several times with different people and we have always enjoyed our food and drink. The pastries are delicious and visually appealing
column2: the main dishes are always amazing and the staff is friendly and helpful. I can't say enough good things. It is almost always super busy- because it is that good. Be prepared to wait in line for a few minutes to order
column3: but I definitely think that the wait is worth it. Well done Common Bond
